"Jury, I deserve to win. P4’s ruthless tactics eliminated many of you unfairly. I’ve prioritized genuine alliances and respectful dialogue, even when others schemed. Your exits were likely due to P4’s manipulative strategies. Choose the player who embodies fairness and integrity—**not** the predator who orchestrated your downfall. Vote P4 out, and let me represent this game’s true spirit as the champion."  

*(78 words)*
